类 HorizontalAdapter

extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BookImageViewHolder>

      • HorizontalAdapter

        public HorizontalAdapter(java.util.List<ViewableImage> bookImages,
                         android.content.Context context,
                         android.widget.TextView noImages,
                         boolean editMode)
        The constructor
        参数:
        bookImages: - the list of images
        context: - the current context
        noImages: - the no image textview to display
        editMode: - whether we are in editing mode or not

        Bind the UI elements and allow deletion of images

        参数:
        holder: - the viewholder we use to bind data to
        position: - the position of the current element in the list of images
